help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Documentation and support to use the platform
help.noResultsDescription: Try modifying your search terms or clear the filters.
help.paymentConfigDescription: Configure different payment methods for your platform
help.comingSoonMessage: This payment method will be available soon in a future update.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Overview of your real estate activity with statistics and key indicators
dashboard.technical: React interface with real-time metrics components and charts
dashboard.functional: View your revenue, managed properties, active tenants and important alerts

properties.title: Property management
properties.description: Add, edit and manage your real estate properties with photos and details
properties.technical: Complete CRUD with image upload and form validation
properties.functional: Create complete property records with location, equipment and status

tenants.title: Tenant management
tenants.description: Manage your tenants, their contracts and personal information
tenants.technical: Relational database system with property-tenant links
tenants.functional: Register tenants, track their payments and manage their file

contracts.title: Lease contracts
contracts.description: Create, edit and track rental contracts with predefined templates
contracts.technical: PDF generator with customizable templates by jurisdiction
contracts.functional: Draft compliant leases, track deadlines and manage renewals

rentPayments.title: Rent tracking
rentPayments.description: Record and track all rent payments with automatic reminders
rentPayments.technical: Payment management system with states and notifications
rentPayments.functional: Mark received payments, generate receipts and track overdue payments

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.description: Manage maintenance requests, interventions and cost tracking
maintenance.technical: Ticket management workflow with statuses and assignment
maintenance.functional: Receive requests, schedule interventions and track expenses

reporting.title: Reports and analytics
reporting.description: Generate financial reports and performance analytics
reporting.technical: Reporting module with Excel/PDF export and charts
reporting.functional: Analyze your revenue, charges and profitability by period and property

settings.title: Configuration
settings.description: Customize the platform according to your needs and preferences
settings.technical: Configuration interface with user preference saving
settings.functional: Configure notifications, document templates and general settings

creditCard.name: Credit Card
creditCard.description: Accept credit card payments via Stripe
steps: Create a Stripe account at stripe.com
Get your API keys from the Stripe dashboard
Test the integration in sandbox mode

bankTransfer.name: Bank Transfer
bankTransfer.description: Accept direct bank transfers from tenants

mobile.name: Mobile Payment
mobile.description: Accept mobile money payments (Orange Money, MTN, etc.)
steps: Get API credentials for each provider

paypal.name: PayPal
steps: Get your Client ID and Secret

securityNote.title: Security Note
securityNote.description: All payment methods are secured with industry-standard encryption and comply with financial regulations. Your sensitive data is protected.
